trans-unit.source: This binding element can be used to enable Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications to send messages to and receive messages from existing MSMQ applications that use either COM, MSMQ native APIs, or the APIs in <xref href="System.Messaging"></xref>.
Use this class to send and receive messages from MSMQ-based messaging applications.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement> class has properties for specifying how to address the queue, how to specify transfer assurances, whether messages must be durably stored, and how messages should be protected and authenticated.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement"></xref> class by using the specified binding name.
The binding name to use.
Gets the type of the binding element.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object that represents the type of binding element associated with this configuration element.

Initializes the properties of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement"></xref> object by using the properties of the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> object.

The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding"></xref> object to use to initialize the properties of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement"></xref> object.
Called when the content of this binding is applied to a specified binding.
The binding to which the settings are applied.
Gets a configuration property collection associated with this configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a set of properties associated with this configuration element.
Gets the type of security to be used with the binding.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityElement"></xref> that specifies the type of security to be used with this binding.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"></xref> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
This property can have one of the following values:
`ActiveX` - The ActiveX serializer is used to serialize objects.
`Binary` - The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> is used to serialize objects.
`ByteArray` - The object is serialized to an array of bytes.
`Stream` - The object is serialized to a stream.
`Xml` - The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is used to serialize objects.
The default value is `Xml`.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"></xref> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
